name: Zhezhi
description: An artist for hire trying to make a living. Reserved and timid, she is not good with words but speaks volumes through her art, where her creations come to life with impossible authenticity.

details.Basic Attack: Perform up to 3 consecutive attacks, dealing Glacio DMG.
details.Heavy Attack: Consume STA to perform an attack, dealing Glacio DMG. Heavy Attack does not reset the Basic Attack cycle.
details.Mid-air Attack: Consume STA to perform up to 2 consecutive attacks while in mid-air, dealing Glacio DMG.
details.Dodge Counter: Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG.

details.Resonance Skill - Manifestation: Deal Glacio DMG. If Afflatus is no less than 60, consume 60 Afflatus to summon Phantasmic Imprint - Left and Phantasmic Imprint - Right. • Press the button on the ground to summon the Imprints on the ground. • Hold on the ground or press in mid-air to summon the Imprints in mid-air.

details.Resonance Liberation - Living Canvas: Summon InkLit Spirits for assistance (can be cast in mid-air). When the active Resonator deals DMG, for 3s after dealing DMG one InkLit Spirit is summoned per second (once per second). Up to 1 InkLit Spirit can be summoned every second, and up to 21 in total. Lasts for 30s or until max InkLit Spirits are summoned.

details.Phantasmic Imprint: May summon Phantasmic Imprints at the cost of Afflatus when casting Resonance Skill Manifestation or Heavy Attack Conjuration. Up to 1 of each Left, Middle, and Right can exist at the same time, each lasting for 15s.
details.Heavy Attack - Conjuration: The following consume STA to attack, dealing Glacio DMG: • Hold Normal Attack shortly after Basic Attack Stage 3. • Press Normal Attack shortly after casting Resonance Skill Manifestation. • Hold Normal Attack shortly after casting Stroke of Genius or Creation’s Zenith. • Hold Normal Attack while in mid-air. • Hold Normal Attack after a successful Dodge. If Afflatus ≥ 30 when performing any of these, consume 30 Afflatus to summon a Phantasmic Imprint - Middle.
details.Resonance Skill - Stroke of Genius: When a Phantasmic Imprint is nearby, Manifestation is replaced with Stroke of Genius (can be cast mid-air). Move to the Imprint, remove it, then summon an Ivory Herald to attack, dealing Glacio DMG (considered Basic Attack DMG) and refreshing mid-air Dodge attempts if the target Imprint is in mid-air. Gain 1 stack of Painter’s Delight, lasting 8s and stacking up to 2 times.
details.Resonance Skill - Creation's Zenith: When a Phantasmic Imprint is nearby and there are 2 stacks of Painter’s Delight, Stroke of Genius is replaced with Creation’s Zenith (can be cast mid-air). Move to the Imprint, remove it, then summon a greater Ivory Herald to attack, dealing higher Glacio DMG (considered Basic Attack DMG) and increasing Basic Attack DMG Bonus by 18% for 27s. Refresh mid-air Dodge attempts if the target Imprint is in mid-air.
details.Afflatus: Zhezhi can hold up to 90 Afflatus. Normal Attacks grant Afflatus on hit. Casting Intro Skill grants Afflatus.

inherent_skill1.name: Calligrapher's Touch
inherent_skill1.description: When casting Resonance Skill Stroke of Genius or Resonance Skill Creation’s Zenith, ATK is increased by 6% for 27s, stacking up to 3 times.

inherent_skill2.name: Flourish
inherent_skill2.description: After Outro Skill is cast, restore 15 Resonance Energy for the incoming Resonator.

intro_skill.name: Radiant Ruin
intro_skill.description: Attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG.

outro_skill.name: Carve and Draw
outro_skill.description: The incoming Resonator has their Glacio DMG Amplified by 20% and Resonance Skill DMG Amplified by 25% for 14s or until they are switched out.

resonance_chain.s1: When casting Creation’s Zenith, restore 15 Resonance Energy and increase Crit. Rate by 10% for 27s.
resonance_chain.s2: Max InkLit Spirits summoned by Resonance Liberation Living Canvas increases by 6.
resonance_chain.s3: When Manifestation, Stroke of Genius, or Creation’s Zenith is cast, ATK increases by 15%, stacking up to 3 times for 27s.
resonance_chain.s4: When Resonance Liberation Living Canvas is cast, ATK of all Resonators on the team increases by 20% for 30s.
resonance_chain.s5: For every 3 InkLit Spirits summoned by Living Canvas, summon 1 extra InkLit Spirit to perform a Coordinated Attack, dealing DMG equal to 140% of an InkLit Spirit’s DMG, considered Basic Attack DMG (this extra hit does not further summon Spirits).
resonance_chain.s6: When Stroke of Genius or Creation’s Zenith is cast, an extra Ivory Herald is summoned to deal DMG equal to 120% of Stroke of Genius’s DMG, considered Basic Attack DMG.
